document.full_text: the rangers scored three goals in eight minutes of the second period for a 6-3 victory over the islanders that gave them their fourth win in five games.
document.title: rangers 6, islanders 3: scoring outburst powers rangers
lines_and_colors: the rangers scored three goals in eight minutes of the second period for a 6-3 victory over the islanders that gave them their fourth win in five games.
